sentences.sentence: The child could not even swallow a morsel, though she tried to eat out of obedience.
sentences.translation: 这孩子连一口也咽不下去，尽管她非常听话地想要吃下去。

sentences.sentence: He ate it all, down to the last morsel.
The wolf thought he was in joke, and came one night to get a dainty morsel.
sentences.translation: 狼以为他是在开玩笑，一天晚上来取美味的食物。
